sentences.sContent: Patrick sat gazing into space  (= looking straight in front, not at any particular person or thing ).
sentences.sCn: 帕特里克坐着，茫然地看着前方。

phrases.pCn: ◎【纹章学】(鹿或类似鹿的动物)从旁看去似在盯着人看的，侧身正视的

remMethod.val: “盖茨” → 比尔·盖茨令世人瞩目 → 凝视， 注视

trans.tranOther: to look at someone or something for a long time, giving it all your attention, often without realizing you are doing so
